data.title: The capital of Bahmani Kingdom, Gulbarga, was also known as
data.meta_description: Ahsanabad The capital of Bahmani Kingdom Gulbarga was originally known as Ahsanabad which was later shifted to Muhammadabad Bidar
data.text:
Q. The capital of Bahmani Kingdom, Gulbarga, was also known as

Answer: Ahsanabad

Notes: The capital of Bahmani Kingdom, Gulbarga, was originally known as Ahsanabad, which was later shifted to Muhammadabad (Bidar).

1

The above question is part of 35000+ General Studies MCQ Series Course on GKToday Android app.
